amendment.description: Amendment raises to $50 million the amount of non-cash support which can be provided to the International War Crimes Tribunal in The Hague.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 52 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to raise from $25 million to $50 million the limitation on the amount of non-cash support provided to the International War Crimes Tribunal for commodities and services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
